When Ophidian Oracle enters the battlefield, draw a card, then abound. [i](To abound, you may cast a nonland card that costs less than this from your hand without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Conjure {2}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this creature from your graveyard for its conjure cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield or if it would leave the battlefield.)[/i]
